# dataRepresentation

**Instance Property**

Returns the opaque data representation of the machine identifier.

## Declaration

```swift
var dataRepresentation: Data { get }
```

## Discussion

You can use this to recreate the same machine identifier with [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZMacMachineIdentifier/init(dataRepresentation:)].
title: dataRepresentation
